trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slings an? (\w+) rune at you\, hitting you in the chest\.$
trigger.name: runes_sling1__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slings an? (\w+) rune and an? (\w+) rune at you\, hitting you in the chest\.$
trigger.name: runes_sling2__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slings an? \w+ rune(?:and an? \w+ rune)? at [A-Z][a-z]+\, hitting [hH](?:im|er) in the chest\.$
